get.summary: Delivers all details about a vehicle type for given Schwacke or GlobalTypeId codes and specific price list date

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: The Bearer Authorization token received from Kosyfa Handshake or, temporarily, the Basic user/password value, e.g., from http://www.blitter.se/utils/basic-authentication-header-generator/

parameters.name: nationalTypeCode
parameters.description: Schwacke national type code, required if globalTypeId isn't provided

parameters.name: globalTypeId
parameters.description: The global type ID accross all datasources, required if typeId isn't provided

parameters.name: priceListDate
parameters.description: The price list date to retrieve the type that is included in a price list. If the date falls within a price list, the type will be returned from that list. If the date is before the start of the first valid price list, the date will be adjusted to the start date of the first valid price list for the type. If it is after the end of the last valid price list, it will be adjusted to the end date of the last valid price list. Therefore, the priceListDate parameter will never cause an error, but it should be considered in the presentation of the results in the consuming application. This parameter is not evaluated when searching by globalTypeId.

parameters.name: datasource
parameters.description: Data source

get.summary: List of manufacturers with their corresponding manufacturer ID according to Schwacke

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: The Bearer Authorization token received from Kosyfa Handshake or, temporarily, the Basic user/password value, e.g., from http://www.blitter.se/utils/basic-authentication-header-generator/

parameters.name: datasource
parameters.description: Data source

parameters.name: nationalVehicleTypes
parameters.description: List of object categories (Schwacke VehicleType) used to filter the search. Possible values are: 10 for passenger cars, 20 for vans, 30 for motorcycles, and 40 for SUVs. The parameters are optional, and multiple values can be provided.

parameters.name: vehicleClasses
parameters.description: List of object categories (VehicleClass) used to filter the search. Possible values are: CAR for passenger cars or SUVs, VAN for vans, MOTORCYCLE for motorcycles. The parameters are optional, and multiple values can be provided.

get.summary: Models with names and Schwacke IDs of the models and the manufacturer

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: The Bearer Authorization token received from Kosyfa Handshake or, temporarily, the Basic user/password value, e.g., from http://www.blitter.se/utils/basic-authentication-header-generator/

parameters.name: nationalModelCode
parameters.description: Schwacke NATCode of the model (required if no other Id is provided)

parameters.name: nationalMakeCode
parameters.description: Schwacke NATCode of the manufacturer (required if no other Id is provided)

parameters.name: globalModelId
parameters.description: Id of the model across all data sources (required if no other Id is provided)

parameters.name: globalMakeId
parameters.description: Id of the manufacturer across all data sources (required if no other Id is provided)

parameters.name: datasource
parameters.description: Data source

parameters.name: nationalVehicleTypes
parameters.description: List of object categories (Schwacke VehicleType) used to filter the search. Possible values are: 10 for cars, 20 for vans, 30 for motorcycles, and 40 for SUVs. The parameter is optional and multiple values can be entered.

parameters.name: vehicleClasses
parameters.description: List of object categories (VehicleClass) used to filter the search. Possible values are: CAR for cars or SUVs, VAN for vans, MOTORCYCLE for motorcycles. The parameter is optional and multiple values can be entered.

get.summary: Price lists with start and end dates for a given model, type, and time interval

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: The Bearer Authorization token received from Kosyfa Handshake or, temporarily, the Basic user/password value, e.g., from http://www.blitter.se/utils/basic-authentication-header-generator/

parameters.name: nationalModelCode
parameters.description: Schwacke NATCode of the model (required if no other Id is provided)

parameters.name: nationalTypeCode
parameters.description: Schwacke NATCode of the type (required if no other Id is provided)

parameters.name: globalModelId
parameters.description: Id of the model across all data sources (required if no other Id is provided)

parameters.name: globalTypeId
parameters.description: Id of the type across all data sources (required if no other Id is provided)

parameters.name: datasource
parameters.description: Data source

parameters.name: beginDateRange
parameters.description: Start of the interval for which the price list values are expected

parameters.name: endDateRange
parameters.description: End of the interval for which the price list values are expected

get.summary: All vehicle types for a manufacturer or model within a price list interval

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: The Bearer Authorization token received from Kosyfa Handshake or, temporarily, the Basic user/password value, e.g., from http://www.blitter.se/utils/basic-authentication-header-generator/

parameters.name: nationalMakeCode
parameters.description: Schwacke NATCode of the manufacturer (required if national model code is not provided)

parameters.name: nationalModelCode
parameters.description: Schwacke NATCode of the model (required if national model code is not provided)

parameters.name: globalModelId
parameters.description: Id of the model across all data sources (required if no other Id is provided)

parameters.name: manufacturerCodePrefix
parameters.description: Prefix, optional field to filter by list of manufacturer codes

parameters.name: datasource
parameters.description: Data source

parameters.name: tsn
parameters.description: The TypSchluesselnummer (Type Key Number)

parameters.name: hsn
parameters.description: The Herstellerschluesselnummer (Manufacturer Key Number)

parameters.name: power
parameters.description: Engine power in kW

parameters.name: priceListBeginDate
parameters.description: Start date of the price list validity (ISO 8601 format)

parameters.name: priceListEndDate
parameters.description: End date of the price list validity (ISO 8601 format)

id.description: Additional ID of the basic equipment according to Schwacke

code.description: SOA code according to Schwacke of the basic equipment

description.description: Long text / description of the basic equipment

manufacturerCode.description: Manufacturer order code of the basic equipment

flagPack.description: Flag that describes whether the equipment belongs to a package, is individual, or both. 0 - Individual item, 1 - Equipment package, 2 - Individual item but also included in an equipment package

targetGroup.description: Flag that describes whether the equipment belongs to a fleet package (0 = Customer (Standard), 1 = Fleet only)

esacoList.description: List of Schwacke Esacos applicable to the basic equipment

colorDataList.description: List of available colors for this basic equipment

manufacturerColorName.description: Name of the color by the manufacturer

manufacturerColorType.description: The type of a manufacturer color: exterior color or interior upholstery color. 0 = Exterior color, 1 = Interior upholstery color

mainGroupName.description: The name of the main group

nationalMakeCode.description: Schwacke NATCode of the vehicle manufacturer

globalMakeId.description: ID that identifies this make among different datasources

datasource.description: Datasource that identifies the origin of the data

datasources.description: Datasources that identify all the origins of the data

globalModelId.description: ID of the model across all data sources

globalMakeId.description: ID of the manufacturer across all data sources

productionStart.description: The start date of the model production.

productionEnd.description: The end date of the model production.

id.description: Schwacke additional ID of the optional equipment

code.description: Schwacke SOA code of the optional equipment

description.description: Long text / description of the optional equipment

manufacturerCode.description: Manufacturer order code of the optional equipment

flagPack.description: Flag that describes if the equipment belongs to a package, is individual, or both. 0 - Individual item 1 - Equipment package 2 - Individual item but also included in an equipment package

targetGroup.description: Flag that describes if the equipment belongs to a fleet package: 0 = Customer (Standard) 1 = Fleet only

priceNet.description: Net price of the optional equipment

priceGross.description: Gross price of the optional equipment

colorDataList.description: List of available colors for this optional equipment

esacoList.description: List of Schwacke Esacos applicable to the optional equipment

priceListBeginDate.description: Start date of the price list validity (ISO 8601 format)

priceListEndDate.description: End date of the price list validity (ISO 8601 format)

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the error occurred

path.description: The path that triggered the error

requestId.description: Unique identifier for the request associated with the error
